We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Interior Architect

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Interior Architect to design, plan, and oversee interior spaces that align with functional needs, brand identity, and aesthetic vision.
	The ideal candidate will have strong design skills, technical expertise, and the ability to translate client requirements into innovative, sustainable, and practical solutions.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop design concepts, drawings, and specifications for residential, commercial, or hospitality spaces.
	Conduct site analysis and space planning to maximize usability and aesthetics.
	Prepare detailed technical drawings using AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, or related tools.
	Collaborate with clients, engineers, contractors, and project managers to ensure project success.
	Source materials, finishes, furniture, and lighting that align with design intent and budget.
	Ensure compliance with building codes, safety standards, and sustainability practices.
	Manage projects from concept to execution, including timelines, budgets, and quality checks.
	Present design ideas and 3D visualizations to clients and stakeholders.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s or Master&rsquo;s degree in Interior Architecture, Interior Design, or related field.
	Proven experience as an Interior Architect (portfolio required).
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, 3ds Max, or other design software.
	Strong project management and communication skills.
	Knowledge of sustainable and eco-friendly design practices.
	Ability to balance creativity with practicality and budget constraints.


Method of Application

        At Elvaridah, we emphasize on the critical matters and prospects of organizations such as business growth, strategy, planning, marketing, structure, and people management across different industries. We help companies focus on the growth of their businesses while aligning costs with strategy. With our all-inclusive approach and expertise, we capture values across the boundaries of any organization. Elvaridah focuses on optimizing all the different parts of a business as a unit.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Interior Architect

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview
     

            
    




	We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Interior Architect to design, plan, and oversee interior spaces that align with functional needs, brand identity, and aesthetic vision.
	The ideal candidate will have strong design skills, technical expertise, and the ability to translate client requirements into innovative, sustainable, and practical solutions.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop design concepts, drawings, and specifications for residential, commercial, or hospitality spaces.
	Conduct site analysis and space planning to maximize usability and aesthetics.
	Prepare detailed technical drawings using AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, or related tools.
	Collaborate with clients, engineers, contractors, and project managers to ensure project success.
	Source materials, finishes, furniture, and lighting that align with design intent and budget.
	Ensure compliance with building codes, safety standards, and sustainability practices.
	Manage projects from concept to execution, including timelines, budgets, and quality checks.
	Present design ideas and 3D visualizations to clients and stakeholders.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Interior Architecture, Interior Design, or related field.
	Proven experience as an Interior Architect (portfolio required).
	Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, 3ds Max, or other design software.
	Strong project management and communication skills.
	Knowledge of sustainable and eco-friendly design practices.
	Ability to balance creativity with practicality and budget constraints.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: careers@elvaridah.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	Financial record-keeping and accounting

	Financial reporting and analysis
	Cash flow management
	Accounts payable and receivable management
	Financial forecasting and projections
	Compliance with financial regulations and policies
	Internal control and risk management

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Cashier",
  "description": "The Wells Carlton Hotel &amp; Apartments is a beautiful, fantasy-like journey into a glamorous world of pure luxury, privacy, exceptional service and gratifying indulgence. It is located in one of the most secured and serene locations in Abuja. The facility features an endless wave of sophistication, style &amp; glamour that leaves guests breathless whilst providing a unique sense of comfort and convenience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier

Job Location:&nbsp;Asokoro, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	We are looking for a Cashier to manage all transactions with customers accurately and efficiently.
	A Cashier whose responsibilities include receiving payments and issuing receipts, and keeping track of all cash and credit transactions.
	Must have previous experience in a customer service position and good knowledge of how cash registers operate.


Responsibilities


	Manage transactions with customers using cash registers
	Scan goods and ensure pricing is accurate
	Collect payments whether in cash or credit
	Issue receipts, refunds, change or tickets
	Redeem stamps and coupons
	Cross-sell products and introduce new ones
	Resolve customer complaints, guide them and provide relevant information
	Greet customers when entering or leaving the store
	Maintain clean and tidy checkout areas
	Track transactions on balance sheets and report any discrepancies
	Bag, box or gift-wrap packages
	Handle merchandise returns and exchanges


Requirements and skills


	High school degree.
	Work experience as a Retail Cashier or in a similar role in sales
	Basic PC knowledge
	Familiarity with electronic equipment, like cash register and POS
	Good math skills
	Strong communication and time management skills
	Customer satisfaction-oriented


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to:&nbsp;wellscarlton42@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Cashier Job at Wells Carlton Hotel & Apartments




        
    

        
        The Wells Carlton Hotel & Apartments is a beautiful, fantasy-like journey into a glamorous world of pure luxury, privacy, exceptional service and gratifying indulgence. It is located in one of the most secured and serene locations in Abuja. The facility features an endless wave of sophistication, style & glamour that leaves guests breathless whilst providing a unique sense of comfort and convenience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier

Job Location: Asokoro, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief
     

            
    




	We are looking for a Cashier to manage all transactions with customers accurately and efficiently.
	A Cashier whose responsibilities include receiving payments and issuing receipts, and keeping track of all cash and credit transactions.
	Must have previous experience in a customer service position and good knowledge of how cash registers operate.


Responsibilities


	Manage transactions with customers using cash registers
	Scan goods and ensure pricing is accurate
	Collect payments whether in cash or credit
	Issue receipts, refunds, change or tickets
	Redeem stamps and coupons
	Cross-sell products and introduce new ones
	Resolve customer complaints, guide them and provide relevant information
	Greet customers when entering or leaving the store
	Maintain clean and tidy checkout areas
	Track transactions on balance sheets and report any discrepancies
	Bag, box or gift-wrap packages
	Handle merchandise returns and exchanges


Requirements and skills


	High school degree.
	Work experience as a Retail Cashier or in a similar role in sales
	Basic PC knowledge
	Familiarity with electronic equipment, like cash register and POS
	Good math skills
	Strong communication and time management skills
	Customer satisfaction-oriented


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: wellscarlton42@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
